title: Virtual Reality-Based Advanced Microbiology Inquiry: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology and introductory microbiology knowledge, with practical experience in medical/technical fields
context.additional_context: Learners access VR environments via smartphones, focusing on visualizing complex microbial structures. Project outcomes assess field applicability

learning_goals: Learners can analyze 3D models of microbial cell structures in a VR environment and identify key organelles with 90% accuracy
Through PBL team projects, learners can develop solutions applying microbiology theories to real-world medical/technical problems
Learners can compare differences in learning effectiveness based on VR immersion levels and incorporate findings into instructional design

resources: PBL Collaboration Tools (Online Whiteboard, Document Sharing System)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
